name: Dan Repetto
description: I’ve learned so much about myself in the last several years and, as a result, I know exactly what I want out of life and in a “partner”.I believe in Karma – what goes around, comes around. Therefore, I treat others with the uttermost respect. I believe that we have something to learn from everyone who crosses our path in life.I am a very easy-going and down-to-earth person who tries his best not to sweat the small stuff. It takes a lot to make me upset. Instead, I prefer to save that energy for more productive things.
